physical_examinations.vital_signs: Height: 105.5 cm; Weight: 18.4 kg; Head circumference: 48 cm
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Short trunk, severely delayed short stature, relative microcephaly, coarse face, long chin, short neck, sternal protrusion, barrel chest, abdominal distension, lumbar hyperlordosis, mild scoliosis, valgus deformity of the knee, limited elbow extension, broad hands, and clawed fingers. The patient exhibited a prepubertal state in external genitalia.
Follow-up examination demonstrated evidence of solid fusion without implant failure. The patient had no complaints of any pain.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Demonstrated solid fusion without implant failure, indicating improvement.
